term: Hit the nail on the head
meaning: To describe exactly what is causing a situation or problem
example: When you said the team lacks motivation, you hit the nail on the head.

term: Let the cat out of the bag
example: I let the cat out of the bag about the surprise party.
The exam was a piece of cake.

term: Cost an arm and a leg
example: This designer bag cost me an arm and a leg.
Break a leg on your performance tonight!
